body:
#selector-pseudo-element-case

Specify lowercase or uppercase for pseudo-element selectors.

    a::before {}
/**    ↑
 * This is pseudo-element selector */

#Options

string: "lower"|"upper"

#"lower"

The following patterns are considered warnings:

a:Before {}
a:bEfOrE {}
a:BEFORE {}
a::Before {}
a::bEfOrE {}
a::BEFORE {}
input::-MOZ-PLACEHOLDER {}

The following patterns are not considered warnings:

a:before {}
a::before {}
input::-moz-placeholder {}

#"upper"

The following patterns are considered warnings:

a:Before {}
a:bEfOrE {}
a:BEFORE {}
a::Before {}
a::bEfOrE {}
a::before {}
input::-moz-placeholder {}

The following patterns are not considered warnings:

a:BEFORE {}
a::BEFORE {}
input::-MOZ-PLACEHOLDER {}
rawBody:
# selector-pseudo-element-case

Specify lowercase or uppercase for pseudo-element selectors.

```css
    a::before {}
/**    ↑
 * This is pseudo-element selector */
```

## Options

`string`: `"lower"|"upper"`

### `"lower"`

The following patterns are considered warnings:

```css
a:Before {}
```

```css
a:bEfOrE {}
```

```css
a:BEFORE {}
```

```css
a::Before {}
```

```css
a::bEfOrE {}
```

```css
a::BEFORE {}
```

```css
input::-MOZ-PLACEHOLDER {}
```

The following patterns are *not* considered warnings:

```css
a:before {}
```

```css
a::before {}
```

```css
input::-moz-placeholder {}
```

### `"upper"`

The following patterns are considered warnings:

```css
a:Before {}
```

```css
a:bEfOrE {}
```

```css
a:BEFORE {}
```

```css
a::Before {}
```

```css
a::bEfOrE {}
```

```css
a::before {}
```

```css
input::-moz-placeholder {}
```

The following patterns are *not* considered warnings:

```css
a:BEFORE {}
```

```css
a::BEFORE {}
```

```css
input::-MOZ-PLACEHOLDER {}
```

---
title: selector-pseudo-element-case
---

# selector-pseudo-element-case

Specify lowercase or uppercase for pseudo-element selectors.

```css
    a::before {}
/**    ↑
 * This is pseudo-element selector */
```

## Options

`string`: `"lower"|"upper"`

### `"lower"`

The following patterns are considered warnings:

```css
a:Before {}
```

```css
a:bEfOrE {}
```

```css
a:BEFORE {}
```

```css
a::Before {}
```

```css
a::bEfOrE {}
```

```css
a::BEFORE {}
```

```css
input::-MOZ-PLACEHOLDER {}
```

The following patterns are *not* considered warnings:

```css
a:before {}
```

```css
a::before {}
```

```css
input::-moz-placeholder {}
```

### `"upper"`

The following patterns are considered warnings:

```css
a:Before {}
```

```css
a:bEfOrE {}
```

```css
a:BEFORE {}
```

```css
a::Before {}
```

```css
a::bEfOrE {}
```

```css
a::before {}
```

```css
input::-moz-placeholder {}
```

The following patterns are *not* considered warnings:

```css
a:BEFORE {}
```

```css
a::BEFORE {}
```

```css
input::-MOZ-PLACEHOLDER {}
```
